cast.overview: As the deceased soul Ja-hong and his three afterlife guardians prepare for their remaining trials for reincarnation, the guardians soon come face to face with the truth of their tragic time on Earth 1,000 years earlier.
cast.title: Along with the Gods: The Last 49 Days

details.biography: Ahn Ji-ho (born 5 January 2004) is a South Korean actor. He began working as a child star in movies at the age of 12, appearing in “Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned” in 2016. He continued to appear in films as a teenager, featuring in titles such as “Inseparable Bros” in 2019. In 2020, he made his drama series debut in the crime thriller series “Nobody Knows.”
details.name: Ahn Ji-ho
